channel.title: My server auto-reset wont work
channel.description: I left my server on all night (planning on leaving it on 24/7) to wake up and find out that the server didn't reset. It just crashed. Anyone have a decent auto reset code that would restart the server every 10 minutes? The old one I have I believe doesnt work and is confusing, so I have no clue what I'm editing... :confused: Sorry im a complete noob when it comes to stuff like this. :([br][size=1]Posted on: April 04, 2007, 03:55:24 AM[/size][hr]thanks for the help?

item.title: My server auto-reset wont work
item.dc:creator: @Muffinator Muffinator
item.description:
@Muffinator wrote:

I left my server on all night (planning on leaving it on 24/7) to wake up and find out that the server didn’t reset. It just crashed. Anyone have a decent auto reset code that would restart the server every 10 minutes? The old one I have I believe doesnt work and is confusing, so I have no clue what I’m editing… Sorry im a complete noob when it comes to stuff like this. :([br][size=1]Posted on: April 04, 2007, 03:55:24 AM[/size][hr]thanks for the help?
